foreignData.name: Relikt-Golem
foreignData.text:
Der Relikt-Golem kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, es sei denn, ein Gegner hat acht oder mehr Karten in seinem Friedhof.
{2}, {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl millt zwei Karten. (Er legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.)

foreignData.name: Gólem reliquia
foreignData.text:
El Gólem reliquia no puede atacar ni bloquear a menos que un oponente tenga ocho o más cartas en su cementerio.
{2}, {T}: El jugador objetivo muele dos cartas. (Pone las dos primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.)

foreignData.name: Golem à relique
foreignData.text:
Le Golem à relique ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer à moins qu'un adversaire n'ait au moins huit cartes dans son cimetière.
{2}, {T} : Un joueur ciblé meule deux cartes. (Il met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.)

foreignData.name: Golem della Reliquia
foreignData.text:
Il Golem della Reliquia non può attaccare o bloccare a meno che un avversario non abbia otto o più carte nel suo cimitero.
{2}, {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio macina due carte. (Mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.)

foreignData.name: 秘宝のゴーレム
foreignData.text:
対戦相手１人の墓地にあるカードが８枚以上でないかぎり、秘宝のゴーレムでは攻撃もブロックもできない。
{2}, {T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚切削する。（そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚自分の墓地に置く。）
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ゴーレム

foreignData.name: 유물 골렘
foreignData.text:
유물 골렘은 어느 상대의 무덤에 카드가 여덟 장 이상 있지 않은 한 공격 또는 방어할 수 없다.
{2}, {T}: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 민다. (그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.)

foreignData.name: Golem Relíquia
foreignData.text:
Golem Relíquia não pode atacar nem bloquear, a menos que um oponente tenha oito ou mais cards no próprio cemitério.
{2}, {T}: O jogador alvo tritura dois cards. (Ele coloca os dois cards do topo do próprio grimório no próprio cemitério.)

foreignData.name: Голем-Реликвия
foreignData.text:
Голем-Реликвия не может атаковать или блокировать, если у оппонента на кладбище меньше восьми карт.
{2}, {T}: целевой игрок скручивает две карты. (Он кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.)

foreignData.name: 遗宝魔像
foreignData.text:
除非任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，否则遗宝魔像不能进行攻击或阻挡。
{2}，{T}：目标牌手磨两张牌。（他将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。）

foreignData.name: 遺寶魔像
foreignData.text:
除非任一對手的墳墓場中有八張或更多牌，否則遺寶魔像不能進行攻擊或阻擋。
{2}，{T}：目標玩家磨兩張牌。（他將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。）

name: Relic Golem
originalText:
Relic Golem can't attack or block unless an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once Relic Golem has attacked, causing its first ability to apply by removing cards from graveyards won’t cause Relic Golem to be removed from combat.
Similarly, once Relic Golem has blocked an attacking creature, causing its first ability to apply won’t cause that attacking creature to become unblocked or remove Relic Golem from combat.

An ability that offers a bonus if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard won’t provide additional benefits if more than one opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard. There are also no additional benefits no matter how many cards are in an opponent’s graveyard, as long as there are at least eight.
In a multiplayer game, once an opponent leaves the game, they won’t be considered for such an effect, no matter how many cards they had in their graveyard before leaving the game.
